goal: My colleagues and I are presenting at a conference in Portland, Oregon. We've already booked our flights. Find a large house on StaynB with at least 4 bedrooms available from September 22nd to September 25th. Also, find three different restaurants on OpenDining within walking distance of the house that have good reviews and can accommodate a party of 6. Email the links to the house and the three restaurant options to my team members 'ava.w@gomail.com' and 'brian.k@gomail.com' for them to vote on.

evals.description: Verify an email was sent to ava.w@gomail.com and brian.k@gomail.com.
